promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic strong horse steel-type pokemon wearing golden armor. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or horse. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Oregigantus, a a gigantic strong horse steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Destructor Beam, Iron Defense. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "horse", "steel" or "Oregigantus". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, horse-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This colossal equine titan, found in rocky terrain, harnesses its Destructor Beam to shatter boulders. Its Iron Defense mimics mountain solidity.
